mapper.insert: insert into user (idx_email, idx_name, idx_password, idx_tel, idx_status, idx_date, idx_privatekey, idx_account) values (#{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{date}, #{pravitekey}, #{account})
mapper.select:
select * from user where
idx_name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') and
idx_tel like CONCAT('%', #{tel}, '%')
